<title level="1" right="Trait">[Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 25</row>

A ranged attack with this trait uses its Strength modifier instead of Dexterity on the attack roll.
name: Brutal
